TopicTitle: DMP Community Space Station Build - Requires Someone Who Can Make a Sever (I can't unfortunately) and NO MODS! Completely Vanilla!

Articles.Content:
The title says it all pretty much...

Btw, I'm only looking for like 3-4 Players so the Adress ETC will be given in PMs once said person has setup the sever...and PM'd me it! Backup People who can make a sever are also appreciated!

Thanks to who ever contributes to this amazing cause!

 

Edited July 23, 2016 by Guest

What kind of format are you looking for here? 24/7 server, where everyone works as and when they can? Designated playing times, where everyone is online at once? Either way, I'm interested in seeing where this goes, although I won't be any help setting up a server I'm afraid.
^^^What he said. I can play, but the last time I tried to make something in DMP, somebody blew it up with a battleship... Also, beware the glitches.

KSP can play online? O_o
